articles.title: Logitech Considers 'Forever Mouse' With Subscription Fee - MacRumors
articles.description: Logitech has worked on a "forever mouse" that could come with a subscription fee for regular software updates, according to Logitech CEO...
articles.content:
Logitech has worked on a "forever mouse" that could come with a subscription fee for regular software updates, according to Logitech CEO Hanneke Faber.
There are no plans to release such a product a… [+2556 chars]

articles.title: No love lost between Apple and Nvidia as iGiant chooses Google chips for AI training - The Register
articles.description: Things are getting Tensor between Cupertino and Nv
articles.content:
Apple has detailed in a research paper how it trained its latest generative AI models using Google's neural-network accelerators rather than, say, more fashionable Nvidia hardware.
